ConfigWindow_ActionItem_Description: In this panel, you can modify the use conditions for every action.
ConfigWindow_HelpItem_Description: In this panel, you can see all commands for combat that can use in for XIV Auto Attack
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackSmart: Start Attacking in auto-target mode when not in combat. Switch the targeting condition in combat.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackCancel: Stop Attacking, please always do it!
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealArea: Open a period to use one or serveral range healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealSingle: Open a period to use one or serveral single healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseArea: Open a period to use one or serveral range defense actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseSingle: Open a period to use one or serveral single defense actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_EsunaShield: Open a period to use Esuna,tank stance skills or True North.
Configwindow_HelpItem_RaiseShirk: Open a period to use Raise or Shirk.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AntiRepulsion: Open a period to use knockback-penalty skill.
Configwindow_HelpItem_BreakProvoke: Open a period to use break-combo or provoke skill.
Configwindow_HelpItem_Move: Open a period to use move skill.
Configwindow_Helper_EditCombo: Click to edit this custom Combo.
Configwindow_AttackItem_Description:
You can choose to turn on continuous GCDs, 0GCDs for the desired profession.
The occupation in the settings is the same as the current in-game occupation, then there will be a reminder to set the corresponding macro.
Configwindow_AttackItem_LoadScript: Click to load a custom loop
Configwindow_AttackItem_ScriptFolderErro: Please set a storage path to use the custom loop properly!
Configwindow_Events_Description: In this window, you can set what macros to use after some skills are released.
